dashboarduser.tant_que_visiteur:
Am unerzu, tzemreḍ ad twaliḍ agbur rnu ad ternuḍ ismenyifen-ik. 
              Akken ad d-tesnulfuḍ tineɣlin neɣ ad tsuddeḍ ineḍruyen,
dashboarduser.festival_musique_andalouse: Tafaska n ccna andalusi ad tili ass n 20 meɣres di Lezzayer.

artisanat.description_fouta_hak_tissus: Futa, Lḥayek, tinfifin tiqbaylin yettwazeṭṭan s ufus...
artisanat.description_techniques_ancestrales_forme: Tiknikyin tizaykutin, talɣiwin tijenṭaḍin yesɛan azal (am : Beskra, Taɣerdayt)

artisanat.bientt_disponible_achetez:
Ad tili ticki : aɣ srid ɣur iṣenɛiyen izzayriyen 
              rnu mud afus i ddelil yeddren n tmurt-nneɣ.

apropos.description_prserver_transmettre_riche: Ḥrez rnu siweḍ ddelil adelsan azzayri abaɣur i tsuta i d-iteddun.
apropos.description_rendre_culture_accessible: Err tadellest tettwaweḍ i yal yiwen, war tilisa tirakkalin neɣ tidrimnin.
apropos.description_mettre_lumire_richesse: Sban tabaɣurt tadelsant tazzayrit ɣef tfaska tagraɣlant.
apropos.culture_algrie_est:
Idles n Lezzayer d tigawt timzirigt yewwin wid yesɛan tayri 
                  n ddelil, tasekla, sinima d tẓuri tazzayrit.
apropos.notre_mission_mettre:
Tuɣdaḍt-nneɣ : sban tabaɣurt tadelsant n tmurt-nneɣ, 
                  seshel tuffɣa ɣer tneɣlin, qqen imegga rnu mudd tagnit 
                  n usiweḍ i tsuta timaynutin.

ajouteroeuvre.premire_image_ajoute:
Tugna tamezwarut ara yettwarnan ad tuɣal d tugna tagejdant. 
                          Senned ɣef tugna nniḍen akken ad tt-tesbaduḍ d tagejdant.
